definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam

sentences.english: And finally let's pass by the Waterbird Refuge.
sentences.chinese: 最后，我们经过了水鸟保护区。

sentences.english: There is a flock of waterfowls on the pond.
There are 193 mangroves bird species, among them 89 species are waterbirds.
sentences.chinese: 记录到193种红树林鸟类，其中89种是水鸟。

sentences.english: Afew water birds sleep standing on just one leg.
sentences.chinese: 有些水鸟一只脚站着睡。

sentences.english: The oil which discharged into the sea seriously harmed a lot of birds and animals.
sentences.chinese: 流入海洋的石油严重伤害了许多水鸟海兽。

sentences.english: Thousands of waterfowl breed round the lake and live off the fish.
sentences.chinese: 数以千计的水鸟在湖边繁殖，靠鱼为食来生活。

sentences.english: Waterbird species number and individual density in ponds were higher during drawdown than those before and after drawdown.
sentences.chinese: 在放水过程中，养殖塘中水鸟的种类最多，密度最大。

sentences.english: A couple of waterbirds are sploring on and over the lake.
sentences.chinese: 一对水鸟在水面和湖的上空嬉戏玩耍。

sentences.english: The salt marshes and mud flats attract large numbers of waterfowl.
sentences.chinese: 盐碱地和泥滩吸引了大量水鸟。

sentences.english: The scientists are trying to prevent the water birds from leaving the confines of this preservation.
sentences.chinese: 科学家们试图阻止水鸟离开这个保护区的范围。

sentences.english: Or during the day, when shorebirds raucously feed on the wealth of green protein.
sentences.chinese: 白天，许多水鸟聒噪地享用这些营养丰富的绿色蛋白。

sentences.english: "All these wader and water birds have very similar feet, " Lockley.
sentences.chinese: 劳克雷说，“所有这些涉禽和水鸟都长着相似的脚。”

sentences.english: Cui picked up close to the mountains, flocks of waterfowl so that it surprises visitors.
sentences.chinese: 依山拾翠，成群的水鸟让游客为之惊喜。

sentences.english: The grassland along the river is the habitat of many waterfowls.
sentences.chinese: 水边的这片草滩，是许多水鸟的栖息地。

sentences.english: Thousands of waterfowl breed round the lake.
sentences.chinese: 成千上万的水鸟在湖边繁衍后代。

sentences.english: Some water birds skittered over the lake.
sentences.chinese: 几只水鸟飞掠过了湖面。

definition: (bird species of China) little egret (Egretta garzetta)
(bird species of China) common crane (Grus grus)
(bird species of China) ruddy shelduck (Tadorna ferruginea)
(bird species of China) Chinese pond heron (Ardeola bacchus)
(bird species of China) eastern spot-billed duck (Anas zonorhyncha)
(bird species of China) bar-headed goose (Anser indicus)
(bird species of China) European herring gull (Larus argentatus)
(bird species of China) red-crowned crane (Grus japonensis)
